item.description:
Join us for an entertaining evening of trivia!

Morgan White Jr. has been entertaining people on radio and television, at private and public shows, and weekly club shows with his one-of-a kind brand of trivia for over 25 years.

Morgan has entertained in Las Vegas at several casinos and traveled to other states for performances over the past 20 years as well.

I have not only seen Morgan White Jr., I have hired for other events I ran.

$2 fee to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the reservation for Barbara

group.name: 40/50 Something Year Olds - Men & Women Social Networking

item.name: Trivia with Morgan White Jr.
